articles.title: In 2026, AI will move from hype to pragmatism
articles.description: In 2026, here's what you can expect from the AI industry: new architectures, smaller models, world models, reliable agents, physical AI, and products designed for real-world use.

articles.title: DoorDash says it banned driver who seemingly faked a delivery using AI
articles.description: DoorDash seems to have confirmed a viral story about a driver using an AI-generated photo to lie about making a delivery.

articles.title: Tech billionaires cashed out $16 billion in 2025 as stocks soared
articles.description: Jeff Bezos led the way. The Amazon founder sold 25 million shares for $5.7 billion in June and July, right around the time he was getting hitched to Lauren Sanchez in Venice.
